10.ara-name: كتاب الجنائز عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah narrated that:The Prophet said: "Beware of An-Na'i, for indeed announcing one's death is from the deeds of Jahliyyah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ النَّعْىِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About It Being Disliked To Announce One's Death (An-Na'i)
